# FilePicker
FilePicker for BasicServer

## Usage
```TypeScript
import FilePicker, {SelectedItem, DirectoryItemTypes} from "@frugal-ui/fsexpress-filepicker";

const selectedItem = new SelectedItem(item => {
    console.log(`You selected: ${item.path}`);
});

const myFilePicker = FilePicker('Root', 'initial/path', selecctedItem,  [DirectoryItemTypes.Directory, DirectoryItemTypes.File]);
```

## Types
```TypeScript
/* SelectedItem */

export class SelectedItem {
	name?: string;
	path?: string;
	isDirectory?: boolean;

	listener: (item: SelectedItem) => void;

    /* ... */
}

/* DirectoryItemTypes */
export enum DirectoryItemTypes {
	File,
	Directory,
}
```
